malware.name: Adload Adware
malware.description: Adware that injects advertisements into web browsers and modifies search results

malware.name: Genio/Genieo Adware
malware.description: Adware that modifies browser settings, displays unwanted ads, and tracks browsing activity

malware.name: Shlayer Trojan
malware.description: Trojan downloader that installs additional malware and adware on infected systems

malware.name: XCSSET Malware
malware.description: Malware targeting Xcode projects that steals credentials, takes screenshots, and modifies Safari

malware.name: Pirrit Adware
malware.description: Aggressive adware that injects ads and tracks user behavior

malware.name: Mughthesec Malware
malware.description: Backdoor malware providing remote access to infected systems

malware.name: MacKeeper PUP
malware.description: Potentially Unwanted Program (PUP) that uses aggressive advertising tactics

malware.name: Proton RAT
malware.description: Remote Access Trojan that steals passwords, cryptocurrency wallets, and sensitive data

extensions.name: Fake Ad Blocker Extensions
extensions.description: Malicious extensions disguised as legitimate ad blockers that inject ads instead

extensions.name: Cryptojacking Extensions
extensions.description: Extensions that use your computer's resources to mine cryptocurrency

extensions.name: Data Harvesting Extensions
extensions.description: Extensions that collect and sell your browsing data
